title: Lux destroys Fiora in AURF and it's just so sad... it shows what they did to Fiora
body:
I've been bitter about the Fiora rework and very vocal about it for about 2 years.

You ruined my main with the rework is just to troll me personally I feel. 

You removed her double lunge (A sacred Fiora characteristic) 

You removed her Blade Waltz (A sacred Fiora characteristic)
and you replaced it to heal people on my own team who refused to help me during the fight...
after I die to troll me. 

How is that not trolling me? 
I know the community here is nothing but toxic down voters on this topic and refuse to see my side of things.
I know you all LOVE the Fiora rework but none of you play her. 

Not like I do. 
I want to remind you that my champ is ruined. 

I want to remind you that none of you seem open minded about doing something constructive about it. 

We could easily make a twin sister champ just like the old one and call her Laura to make me happy.

I represent many people IN GAME who actually PLAY THE GAME not just TROLL THE MESSAGE BOARDS> 
who would REALLY like the old Fiora back regardless how stubborn the developers are about it.

You could have the best of both FIoras with my idea...  Why not?     Why just bash my idea for the sake of bashing?
